item.description: A|X store opens in Soho, New York
A|X Armani Exchange shops open in Bloomingdales, Saks Fifth Avenue, and Neiman Marcus
ArmaniExchange.com was the first designer brand to launch an ecommerce site
Giorgio Armani launched the A|X Music label for Armani Exchange
A|X Armani Exchange expands into international markets (Brazil, Japan, and United Kingdom)
A|X Armani Exchange introduces the new X4 store concept
A|X Armani Exchange launched the A|X Mens Underwear Collection sold exclusively at Armani Exchange stores
Giorgio Armani Launches Safilo Eyewear for A|X Armani Exchange
A|X Armani Exchange launches A|X Blog – Styletraxx
A|X Armani Exchange introduces a new brandmark
A|X Armani Exchange launches A|X mobile platform
Giorgio Armani Launches A|X:TIME Fossil Watches for Armani Exchange
A|X Armani Exchange entered an exclusive deal with Apple to launch the A|X Music Series on iTunes
A|X Armani Exchange launches online video platform - A|X:TV and A|X video shopping
A|X Armani Exchange launches first fully integrated 3D advertising campaign
A|X Armani Exchange opens it's 201st retail store – now in 24 countries
A|X Armani Exchange celebrates 20 Years of Style
